notes: Evaluation thresholds derived from UK Mass Evacuation Framework planning assumptions + public exercise/report sources. Values are bands, not guarantees.

mass_flood_rwc.description: Reasonable worst-case fluvial flood affecting multiple boroughs
mass_flood_rwc.rationale: Framework planning assumption for mass evacuation + phased approach timings; queue and platform limits are operational comfort bands, not hard law.

chemical_sudden.description: Large sudden-impact chemical release with immediate cordons
chemical_sudden.rationale: Sudden-impact doctrine: fast Police Strategic decisioning, rapid self-evacuation onset; platform limits tightened to manage contamination/meters.

uxo_medium.rationale: Framework cites UXO as typical medium-scale; with planning time, smoother flows and lower crowding expected.

local_gas_small.description: Small, borough-led local gas leak evacuation
local_gas_small.rationale: Small-scale incidents; local command; rapid clearance bands.

central_terror_large.description: Large sudden-impact, multi-site cordons in central area
central_terror_large.rationale: Self-evac surge, station metering, variable staffing; slightly looser queue band than chemical due to multi-node dispersal.
